The same exception is reported in bug 64345 comment 10 running I200405290105.

The IllegalArgumentException is thrown because the paint method tries to create a 
double buffer with empty area (w <= 0 || h <= 0).
I don't know why this happens, but a safety measure is to immediately return from paint if 
the paint area is empty.

Created an attachment (id=11593)
patch for org.eclipse.ui project
patch applied and released for 8pm build on 20040615
Any idea how this can be verified in the build?
Run a synchronize, hit run in background and then click on the link
